column4: I am having a hardware issue. My CD Burner won't burn any CDs.
Well, I have an Optiarc drive
It is an Optiarc DVD RE AD-7190S I tried to burn on a couple of CDs and it basically says the disc is not empty
But I know it is
Says the disc is not writeable
Are you sure the media is good?
What CD burning software are you using?
I tried two discs already
Must be hardware issue.
I use k3b and dono how it could be easier.
Check the data cable.
Replace data cable.
Any other CDs?  Other than what?
What does k3b say?
Are they CDs or DVDs?
cdrecord scambis
Pastebin the output of:  cdrecord scambis
Could be that you have a bad batch of CDs  (I threw away about 20 or 25 one time because I got about half way through a 50 CD batch and found several that wouldnt burn.
I bought a new batch and the worked so I just threw away the old ones.)
See lines 93-98  at  http://pastebin.com/d2b55ba6
Try media from different batch.
Use miniCD
